title: Which of the following is not a typical module of an ERP system? - Quora

response.answer_text: Each ERP system has different ‘typical’ modules, so you’d have to be pretty detailed in this question. Looks like it was posted without complete info. Some ERP’s differ slightly with ‘typical’ modules, and licensing plays a big role in this. For example, I’ve seen implementations that avoided purchasing Advanced Pricing and did some customizations for simple orders (promotions like free shipping).
